item.title: Introduction to R -- Workshop
item.description: Joel Herndon and I regularly present sections of the Intro to R Workshop hosted by the Data and Visualization Services Department. The workshops – official entitled Intro to R: Data Transformations, Data Structures, and the Tidyverse – is a the two-hour, hands-on session designed to provide a gentle introduction to the basics of the Tidyverse data science approach to the R statistical programming language. We use the RStudio development environment. Attendees learn about managing R projects, data types, variable assignments, data wrangling and visualization, and mapping using a focused approach to modern data science known as the tidyverse.
